thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.es | 3 de 71
thread.title: Juan Manuel

author: Juan Manuel
title: Juan Manuel
text: I called eDreams after noting I had chosed the wrong hotel in Russia and after receiving an e-mail regarding an issue with one of the payments. Ramón was very kind, helpful, proactive and finally I booked the perfect hotel and got an excellent advice from Ramón regarding all my queries. I am very grateful for his time and pacience on the phone and would recommend him to anyone.
